questions.question_text: Which of the following business challenges could be solved by using a vulnerability scanner?

choices.A: Auditors want to discover if all systems are following a standard naming convention.
choices.D: There is a monthly requirement to test corporate compliance with host application usage and security policies.
choices.B: A web server was compromised and management needs to know if any further systems were compromised.
choices.C: There is an emergency need to remove administrator access from multiple machines for an employee that quit.

questions.question_text: A security policy will be more accepted by employees if it is consistent and has the support of

discussion.content: WIthout involvement, you will never get commitment from coworkers. This has nothing to do with IT security but only with leadership.
Strange questions. Depends totally on the organization's structure. Not every organization has such a security policy - only perhaps in Utopia.

questions.question_text:
A company has hired a security administrator to maintain and administer Linux and Windows-based systems. Written in the nightly report file is the following:
Firewall log files are at the expected value of 4 MB. The current time is 12am. Exactly two hours later the size has decreased considerably. Another hour goes by and the log files have shrunk in size again.
Which of the following actions should the security administrator take?

choices.C: Run an anti-virus scan because it is likely the system is infected by malware.
choices.B: Log the event as suspicious activity, call a manager, and report this as soon as possible.
choices.A: Log the event as suspicious activity and report this behavior to the incident response team immediately.
choices.D: Log the event as suspicious activity, continue to investigate, and act according to the site's security policy.

questions.question_text: Which type of scan measures a person's external features through a digital video camera?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C makes more sense

Selected Answer: C
Answer is C

Selected Answer: C
The correct answer is C
"monitoring TCP handshaking of packets at the session layer of the OSI model" is the point to note

A circuit-level gateway is a type of firewall. Circuit-level gateways work at the session layer of the OSI model, or as a "shim-layer" between the application layer and the transport layer of the TCP/IP stack. They monitor TCP handshaking between packets to determine whether a requested session is legitimate.

A circuit-level gateway firewall works at the session layer of the OSI model or transport layer of TCP/IP. It forwards data between networks without verification and blocks incoming packets from the host but allows the traffic to pass through itself. Information passed to remote computers through a circuit-level gateway will appear to have originated from the gateway, as the incoming traffic carries the IP address of the proxy (circuit-level gateway). Such firewalls monitor requests to create sessions and determine if those sessions will be allowed.

questions.question_text: While conducting a penetration test, the tester determines that there is a firewall between the tester's machine and the target machine. The firewall is only monitoring TCP handshaking of packets at the session layer of the OSI model. Which type of firewall is the tester trying to traverse?
